message: The alleys are narrower here, and particularly dark.
There are a lot of restaurants too, so the area is full of savory smells and smoke.

name: 蓮
message: "If you do not do something to remedy that situation, in approximately one hour you will likely be suffering from acid indigestion."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What are you talking about? Is my stomach upset?"

name: 蓮
message: "It is a side effect of what you ate yesterday, plus some degree of sleep deprivation."
A strange feeling stops me in my tracks.
I could have sworn someone was staring at me.
I look around, but no one in the area stands out.
